title: Camshaft Drive Chain Tensioner Blade and Rubbing Strip - Inspection

body.body: Camshaft Drive Chain Tensioner Blade and Rubbing Strip - Inspection
Check the camshaft drive chain tensioner blade and rubbing strip for wear or damage. Renew if worn or damaged.
